lines: True humility is being able to accept criticisms as graciously as we accept compliments.
author: <Author:0x00007faace100d30>

lines: Pride is concerned with who is right. Humility is concerned with what is right.
author: <Author:0x00007faace14b1f0>

lines: Humility is the solid foundation of all virtues.
author: <Author:0x00007faace139d10>

lines: Acceptance doesn't mean resignation; it means understanding that something is what it is and that there's got to be a way through it.
author: <Author:0x00007faace128588>

lines: I think tolerance and acceptance and love is something that feeds every community.
author: <Author:0x00007faace172638>

lines: Acceptance is simply love in practice. When you love, you accept, when you lack love, you judge.
author: <Author:0x00007faace160f28>

lines: As I get older, the more I stay focused on the acceptance of myself and others, and choose compassion over judgment and curiosity over fear.
author: <Author:0x00007faace1ab938>

lines: It's worth remembering that it is often the small steps, not the giant leaps, that bring about the most lasting change.
author: <Author:0x00007faace19a430>

lines: Believe in yourself and go for it.
author: <Author:0x00007faace1881b8>

lines: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
author: <Author:0x00007faace1d2650>

lines: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
author: <Author:0x00007faace1c10a8>

lines: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: <Author:0x00007faace20bce8>

lines: Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.
author: <Author:0x00007faace1fa358>

lines: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: <Author:0x00007faace1e8c20>

lines: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
author: <Author:0x00007faace232bb8>

lines: Just one smile, immensely increases the beauty, of the universe.
author: <Author:0x00007faace2217f0>

lines: If you see someone without a smile, give them one of yours.
author: <Author:0x00007faace2702d8>

lines: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word... all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
author: <Author:0x00007faace25ae88>

lines: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy and serenity.
author: <Author:0x00007faace2499f8>

lines: When we create peace and harmony and balance in our minds, we will find it in our lives.
author: <Author:0x00007faace293fa8>

lines: Peace begins with a smile.
author: <Author:0x00007faace282a50>

lines: Choose love and peace will follow. Choose peace and love will follow.
author: <Author:0x00007faace2d0ef8>

lines: Peace, like charity, begins at home.
author: <Author:0x00007faace2bb9e0>

lines: Let us see what love can do.
author: <Author:0x00007faace2aa460>

lines: May love and laughter light your days, and warm your heart and home. May good and faithful friends be yours wherever you may roam...
author: <Author:0x00007faace2f8b38>

lines: I believe in the spirit of equality and the spirit of this country as one of love and compassion and kindness.
author: <Author:0x00007faace2e3030>

lines: We lose ourselves in the things we love. We find ourselves there, too.
author: <Author:0x00007faace331be0>

lines: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: <Author:0x00007faace3207a0>

lines: You have the capability to change your life all with a simple shift in perspective.
author: <Author:0x00007faace30b300>

lines: The smallest change in perspective can transform a life. What tiny attitude adjustment might turn your world around?
author: <Author:0x00007faace3598c0>

lines: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
author: <Author:0x00007faace3482c8>

lines: Wisdom is your perspective on life, your sense of balance, your understanding of how the various parts and principles apply and relate to each other.
author: <Author:0x00007faace392d50>

lines: The best ideas emerge when very different perspectives meet.
author: <Author:0x00007faace3818c0>
